projects.title: Countries v2
projects.description: Second version of Countries built with TS, React, REST API and Tailwind. It was created after first version in order to see the difference in building SPA's or pages in general with and wihtout modern technologies

image.alt: Screenshot of the Countries v2 project

projects.title: aBay - e-commerce store
projects.description: Full stack app with backend and frontend. It will have users, items to sell, cart, user authentication and routing
